page.title: 12HYPERMARKET,IPSWICH FRINGE
page.content: The new Sainsbury Hypermarket under construction on Warren Heath beside the A45(T) road is just outside the boundary of this survey area (only by 100 metres), but permission to build has had a few important repercussions for the survey area. Warren Heath was the breeding ground for several butterflies, it will be interesting to see if the construction noise and then the completed workings, will affect this small but important insect. The residents of Bucklesham Road and Felixstowe Road complained that the value of their very expensive houses will fall. On both these counts we wait and see!
